abstract: 8:15 p.m. (5:15 local time) John Markoff, Times reporter, reports seeing about 200 in line at the Palo Alto store and about the same number in Emeryville. He is trying to figure out how many iPhones will be sold opening weekend. Before he finishes, he wanders down to the San Francisco Apple store.
lead_paragraph: 8:15 p.m. (5:15 local time) John Markoff, Times reporter, reports seeing about 200 in line at the Palo Alto store and about the same number in Emeryville. He is trying to figure out how many iPhones will be sold opening weekend. Before he finishes, he wanders down to the San Francisco Apple store.

headline.main: IPhone: It’s Time — West Coast Edition
